QuestData.Title: Gorgonna
QuestData.Description: This book is written in the pig-tongue the humans use. It needs to be burned immediately.$B$BHand it to my sister Gorgonna and do not waste my time.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Mikhail's Journal to Gorgonna in Conquest Hold.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have something to show me?
QuestData.RewardText: Could it be? The man who wrote this journal feared for his daughters' lives so he sent them away from Silverbrook.$B$BWe just captured an outcast in the outskirts of town about the same age as the eldest daughter.$B$BListen, $n. There's more happening here than meets the eye... we can't just burn this diary.
